general.author: Adam Silver
general.description: Mailto links are everywhere and yet browsers and operating systems don’t make them easy to use. Learn why that is and what we did about it when we launched Frankly, a joint venture helping teams create clear, accessible and user-centred digital products.
general.title: The trouble with mailto email links and what to do instead by Adam Silver – Designer, London, UK.
